data.title: Extra $48 Discount for Starter Plans
data.description: Save $48 with annual billing on the Starter plan. Just select annual subscription; no coupon necessary.

data.title: Get $10–$100 Off Sitewide
data.description: Save up to $100 off any annual N8N plan using rotating promo links. Offers updated weekly—check back for new savings.

data.title: Freemium Forever – Start Free
data.description: Access N8N’s Freemium plan at no cost. How: Sign up, verify your email, and select Freemium in the dashboard. No payment required. Includes core features—upgrade anytime.

data.title: Save $120 Instantly on Pro Yearly
data.description: Take $120 off your first year on the N8N Pro annual plan. No code needed—deal auto-activates at checkout. Steps: Select Pro plan, choose “Yearly Billing,” and proceed. Discount reflected before payment. Scarcity: Only for new subscribers. Offer expires soon.

data.title: Unlock 30% Off Any Plan
data.description: Get 30% off any N8N subscription for 12 months using the code below.Code: (Auto-applied via trusted coupon link)Usage: Visit the checkout page, select your plan, and the discount appears instantly. Hurry: Limited to first 500 redemptions, ends This 2025.

data.title: Paperlike Flash Deal: 25% Off Storewide
data.description:
For newsletter subscribers, Paperlike sometimes drops storewide 25% coupons.
Flash deals last only 72 hours—check emails and blog updates.

data.title: Paperlike 50% Off
data.description:
Buy any two eligible Paperlike accessories, instantly save 50% on the second item.
Perfect for gifting, valid through seasonal promos.

data.title: Paperlike Student Discount
data.description: Verified students and educators get 10% off their Paperlike purchase. Upload ID for activation.
